augmentaP5
Class AugmentaP5

java.lang.Object
  augmentaP5.AugmentaP5

public class AugmentaP5
extends Object

Augmenta Connection: Connects to Augmenta app and provides your applet with Augmenta People objects as they arrive. This library is based on the TSPS library for processing. More details at http://www.tsps.cc/

public Hashtable<Integer,AugmentaPerson> people
Hashtable of current People objects. Accessibly by unique id, e.g. people.get( 0 )

Constructor Detail

AugmentaP5

public AugmentaP5(PApplet _parent)
Starts up Augmenta with the default port (12000). Will also attempt to set up default Augmenta events, so will look for three methods implemented in your app: void personEntered( AugmentaPerson p); void personUpdated( AugmentaPerson p); void personLeft( AugmentaPerson p);

Parameters:
PApplet - _parent Your app (pass in as "this")

AugmentaP5

public AugmentaP5(PApplet _parent,
                  int port)
Starts up Augmenta with a specific port. The port must match what is specified in the Augmenta GUI. Will also attempt to set up default Augmenta events, so will look for three methods implemented in your app: void personEntered( AugmentaPerson p); void personUpdated( AugmentaPerson p); void personLeft( AugmentaPerson p);

Parameters:
PApplet - _parent Your app (pass in as "this")
int - Port set in Augmenta app
